...

  ----- Original Message -----

oups.com

  Subject: Re: Chivtrons =
under attack... again/Clash


  STILLER

rowls and rises to one knee, trying to punch Arrow in the face...)

roups.com

rons under attack... again/Clash


    Arrow is kneed in the face and goes =
down hard. He tries to pull Stiller over by his leg...

l Message -----

    Sent: Thursday, July 12, 2001 7:24 PM

r attack... again/Clash


      STILLER





      Stiller: You better tell=
 your friends not to ruin this. I wanted a fair fight and those bastards ar=
e ruining it!...



      (Stiller tries to knee Arrow in the face...)

   =
     ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: Soulstice Omega 
        T=
o: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Thursday, July 12, 2001 7:02 PM
  =
      Subject: Re: Chivtrons under attack... again/Clash


        Arrow du=
cks the palm and steps right into Termitron's shots meant for Stiller. He's=
 hit by them in the back and goes down to one knee.

        Burning Hammer=
 stares at Perplex is stasis lock while everyone yelled "save Trinity!" He =
shakes his head...

          From:=
 *Orchid*

July 12, 2001 6:08 PM

n/Clash


          STILLER




          (Stiller is headbutted in the fac=
e. He bends over some, wiping mech fluid from his face. Then he springs up,=
 thrusting the palm of his hand upwards at Arrow's face...)

                          (Stiller smiles an=
d puts his crossbow in it's holster. He clutches his fists and stares at Ar=

ssage -----

t: Saturday, July 07, 2001 5:17 AM

e: Chivtrons under attack... again/Clash


                              MC=
GOWAN / BARRYMORE / STILLER / ALBA / VIRGO / LEE / DEPP





              =
                (McGowan jumps over the 2 energy balls and fires a missile =
at Nightlight.)



                              (Barrymore takes one of th=
e energy balls to the chest but dodges the other with a side jump. She fire=
s 6 laser beams at Nightlight.)



                              (Depp is s=
truck by both energy balls, taking them in the left shoulder. Depp fires 7 =
shots at Nightlight.)



                              (Alba ducks the ener=
gy balls and pulls a pin from a grenade and throws it in front of the Chivt=
ron base.)



                              (Stiller growls and fires an ar=
row at Arrow.)



                              (Lee fires a ball of fire a=
t Nightlight's legs, attempting to trip her up.)



                       =
       (Virgo fires a red energy draining dart at Nightlight...)

ronghold. But
